com.infusion.util.event
Interface EventDelegate

public interface EventDelegate

A delegate is passed into the eventBroker as an event, but defers the creation of the event object until the broker knows that there are people that actually care about the event. This could be used when:

  • The creation of the event object is expensive
  • There is work needed to transform one event to another form and you don't want to spend cycles when there's no one that really cares

Method Summary
 Object getEvent(EventBroker eventBroker)
          Returns the actual event
